about_the_game:
About the content included in the demo version of AROMA LOVE

1. You will experience the content of three chapters in the game, with at least six chapters.

2. The gameplay time for this demo is approximately 1.5 hours.

Regarding the official version, the following content will be released (this demo does not include the following content):

1，The full text is 23w words, and the gameplay time is about 8 hours.

2，Three completely different love paths.

3，Recommended strategy sequence: Lu Sihua Jing Tang Luo Fei

4，A fantastic and joyful dessert, enjoy love in a relaxed and comedic atmosphere!

5，Up to 18 possible endings.

You are the owner of a perfume store and a second-generation otaku in an ordinary life, and you run your own perfume store, and live an ordinary but happy life.

One day, a sudden car accident caused you to lose consciousness, and when you woke up again, there were three men who claimed to be employees of the “Human Soul Transit Center”, including angels, demons and fallen angels. You learn that you were supposed to have lost your life in the accident, but have somehow come back from the dead. In order to investigate this anomaly, they need to observe your life for the next few days.

In the process of contacting the three men, the truth of the car accident is revealed, and there seems to be a deeper hidden agenda behind it ......

The truth gradually emerges with three employees - a love affair about perfume. Harvest the memories of your own heartbeat in the game!
